com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl

Class WZGLES.EglEnv

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WZGLES.EglEnv
  • Enclosing class:
    WZGLES

    public static class WZGLES.EglEnv
extends Object
    The class used by the GoCoder SDK to encapsulate OpenGL ES

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EglEnv(EGLContext sharedEglContext)
      Construct a new instance using the default EGLDisplay and create a new EGLContext that shares resource with the specified shared EGLContext and supports the EGL_ANDROID_RECORDABLE extension
      EglEnv(EGLContext eglContextShared, EGLSurface eglBaseSurface)
      Deprecated.  
      EglEnv(EGLContext sharedEglContext, Object nativeSurface)
      Construct a new instance using the default EGLDisplay and create a new EGLContext that shares resource with the specified shared EGLContext supports the EGL_ANDROID_RECORDABLE extension and wrap the specified Android surface with a newly created EGLSurface
      EglEnv(EGLContext sharedEglContext, Object nativeSurface, boolean recordable)
      Construct a new instance using the default EGLDisplay and create a new EGLContext that shares resource with the specified shared EGLContext and wrap the specified Android surface with a newly created EGLSurface
      EglEnv(EGLDisplay eglDisplay, EGLContext eglContext)
      Construct a new instance using the specified EGLDisplay and the specified EGLContext
      EglEnv(EGLDisplay eglDisplay, EGLContext eglContext, EGLSurface eglSurface)
      Construct a new instance using the specified EGLDisplay and the specified EGLContext and the specified EGLSurface
      EglEnv(EGLDisplay eglDisplay, EGLContext eglContext, Object nativeSurface)
      Construct a new instance using the specified EGLDisplay and the specified EGLContext wrap the specified Android surface with an EGLSurface
      EglEnv(int eglVersion)
      Construct a new instance with the specified EGL version and the default EGLDisplay and create a new EGLContext that supports the EGL_ANDROID_RECORDABLE extension
      EglEnv(int eglVersion, boolean recordable)
      Construct a new instance using the specified EGL version and the default EGLDisplay and create a new EGLContext
      EglEnv(int eglVersion, EGLContext sharedEglContext, boolean recordable)
      Construct a new instance using the default EGLDisplay and create a new EGLContext that shares resource with the specified shared EGLContext

      Construct a new instance using the specified parameters

      Construct a new instance using the specified EGL version and the specified EGL display and create a new EGLContext wrap the specified Android surface with a newly created EGLSurface
      EglEnv(int eglVersion, Object nativeSurface, boolean recordable)
      Construct a new instance using the specified EGL version and the default EGL display and create a new EGLContext and wrap the specified Android surface with a newly created EGLSurface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean copySurfaceContents(EGLSurface sourceSurface, int surfaceWidth, int surfaceHeight)
      Copies the content of the specified EGLSurface to this instance's EGLSurface For this operation to be supported, the following conditions must apply: This EglEnv instance's EGLContext must have been created with EGL version 3. This EglEnv instance's EGLContext must have been created by specifying the same EGLContext on which the source EGLSurface was created as a shared context An EGLSurface must have been created for this EglEnv instance
      static EGLSurface createEglSurface(EGLDisplay eglDisplay, EGLSurface eglBaseSurface, Surface nativeSurface)
      Deprecated.

      Generate a new EGLSurface that wraps the specified native Android surface.

      Binds this instance to the current rendering thread and the specified read surface

      Deprecated. 
      Use generateEglWindowSurface(java.lang.Object) instead
      boolean setPresentationTime(long nanoseconds)
      Sets the presentation time for a rendered frame on this EglEnv instance's EGLSurface

      Establish a new shared EGLContext.
      void setTextureId(int textureId)
      Deprecated. 
      do not use EglEnv to track texture ids
      boolean swapBuffers()
      Posts the contents of this EglEnv instance's EGLSurface to the native Android surface If the native surface is associated with a MediaCodec the contents will then be processed by the active encoder or decoder

    • Constructor Detail

      • EglEnv

        public EglEnv(int eglVersion,
              EGLDisplay eglDisplay,
              EGLContext eglContext,
              EGLContext sharedEglContext,
              Object nativeSurface,
              boolean recordable)
        Construct a new instance using the specified parameters
        Parameters:
        eglVersion - The EGL version to use (currently supported values: 2 or 3)
        eglDisplay - The EGL display. If EGL14.EGL_NO_DISPLAY is specified the value EGL14.EGL_DEFAULT_DISPLAY will be used.
        eglContext - The EGL context. If EGL14.EGL_NO_CONTEXT is specified, an EGLContext will be created
        sharedEglContext - Unless EGL14.EGL_NO_CONTEXT is specified, the newly created context will share EGL resources with the specified context
        nativeSurface - If this is not null and is an instance of Surface or SurfaceTexture, an EGLSurface will be automatically created to wrap the native Android surface
        recordable - Indicates that the newly created context should support the EGL EGL_ANDROID_RECORDABLE for use with MediaCodec
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If an error occurs during the creation process

      • EglEnv

        public EglEnv(EGLContext sharedEglContext,
              Object nativeSurface,
              boolean recordable)
        Construct a new instance using the default EGLDisplay and create a new EGLContext that shares resource with the specified shared EGLContext and wrap the specified Android surface with a newly created EGLSurface
        Parameters:
        sharedEglContext - Unless EGL14.EGL_NO_CONTEXT is specified, the newly created context will share EGL resources with the specified context
        nativeSurface - If this is not null and is an instance of Surface or SurfaceTexture, an EGLSurface will be automatically created to wrap the native Android surface
        recordable - Indicates that the newly created context should support the EGL EGL_ANDROID_RECORDABLE for use with MediaCodec
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If an error occurs during the creation process

        Parameters:
        sharedEglContext - Unless EGL14.EGL_NO_CONTEXT is specified, the newly created context will share EGL resources with the specified context
        nativeSurface - If this is not null and is an instance of Surface or SurfaceTexture, an EGLSurface will be automatically created to wrap the native Android surface
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If an error occurs during the creation process

      • EglEnv

        public EglEnv(int eglVersion,
              EGLDisplay eglDisplay,
              Object nativeSurface,
              boolean recordable)
        Construct a new instance using the specified EGL version and the specified EGL display and create a new EGLContext wrap the specified Android surface with a newly created EGLSurface
        Parameters:
        eglVersion - The EGL version to use (currently supported values: 2 or 3)
        eglDisplay - The EGL display. If EGL14.EGL_NO_DISPLAY is specified the value EGL14.EGL_DEFAULT_DISPLAY will be used.
        nativeSurface - If this is not null and is an instance of Surface or SurfaceTexture, an EGLSurface will be automatically created to wrap the native Android surface
        recordable - Indicates that the newly created context should support the EGL EGL_ANDROID_RECORDABLE for use with MediaCodec
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If an error occurs during the creation process

        public EglEnv(int eglVersion,
              Object nativeSurface,
              boolean recordable)

        Parameters:
        eglVersion - The EGL version to use (currently supported values: 2 or 3)
        nativeSurface - If this is not null and is an instance of Surface or SurfaceTexture, an EGLSurface will be automatically created to wrap the native Android surface

      • EglEnv

        public EglEnv(EGLDisplay eglDisplay,
              EGLContext eglContext,
              EGLSurface eglSurface)
        Construct a new instance using the specified EGLDisplay and the specified EGLContext and the specified EGLSurface
        Parameters:
        eglDisplay - The EGL display. If EGL14.EGL_NO_DISPLAY is specified the value EGL14.EGL_DEFAULT_DISPLAY will be used.
        eglContext - The EGL context. If EGL14.EGL_NO_CONTEXT is specified, an EGLContext will be created
        eglSurface - The EGL surface.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If an error occurs during the creation process

      • EglEnv

        public EglEnv(EGLDisplay eglDisplay,
              EGLContext eglContext,
              Object nativeSurface)

        eglContext - The EGL context. If EGL14.EGL_NO_CONTEXT is specified, an EGLContext will be created
        nativeSurface - If this is not null and is an instance of Surface or SurfaceTexture, an EGLSurface will be automatically created to wrap the native Android surface
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If an error occurs during the creation process

      • getEglDisplay

        public EGLDisplay getEglDisplay()
        Returns:
        The EGLDisplay for this instance or EGL14.EGL_NO_DISPLAY of one has not been specified or created

      • getEglContext

        public EGLContext getEglContext()
        Returns:
        The EGLContext for this instance or EGL14.EGL_NO_CONTEXT of one has not been specified or created

      • getEglConfig

        public EGLConfig getEglConfig()
        Returns:
        The EGLConfig for this instance or null if one has not been established

      • getEglVersion

        public int getEglVersion()
        Returns:
        The EGL version for this instance (2 or 3)

      • getEglSurface

        public EGLSurface getEglSurface()
        Returns:
        The EGLSurface for this instance or EGL14.EGL_NO_SURFACE has not been specified or created

        Returns:
        true if successful, false if an error occurred

        eglMakeCurrent

        Returns:
        true if successful, false if an error occurred
        See Also:
        eglMakeCurrent

      • makeNothingCurrent

        public boolean makeNothingCurrent()
        Unbinds this EglEnv instance from the current rendering thread
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if an error occurred
        See Also:
        eglMakeCurrent

      • copySurfaceContents

        public boolean copySurfaceContents(EGLSurface sourceSurface,
                                   int surfaceWidth,
                                   int surfaceHeight)
        Copies the content of the specified EGLSurface to this instance's EGLSurface For this operation to be supported, the following conditions must apply:
        1. This EglEnv instance's EGLContext must have been created with EGL version 3.
        2. This EglEnv instance's EGLContext must have been created by specifying the same EGLContext on which the source EGLSurface was created as a shared context
        3. An EGLSurface must have been created for this EglEnv instance
        Parameters:
        sourceSurface - The source EGLSurface
        surfaceWidth - The width of the source EGLSurface
        surfaceHeight - The height of the source EGLSurface
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if an error occurred

      • setPresentationTime

        public boolean setPresentationTime(long nanoseconds)
        Sets the presentation time for a rendered frame on this EglEnv instance's EGLSurface
        Parameters:
        nanoseconds - the frame's presentation time, in nanoseconds
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if an error occurred
        See Also:
        ANDROID_presentation_time

      • swapBuffers

        public boolean swapBuffers()
        Posts the contents of this EglEnv instance's EGLSurface to the native Android surface If the native surface is associated with a MediaCodec the contents will then be processed by the active encoder or decoder
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if an error occurred
        See Also:
        eglSwapBuffers

      • setSharedEglContext

        public boolean setSharedEglContext(EGLContext eglSharedContext)
        Establish a new shared EGLContext. Note that the current EGLContext will be destroyed first.
        Parameters:
        eglSharedContext - The shared EGLContext
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if an error occurred

      • generateEglWindowSurface

        public EGLSurface generateEglWindowSurface(Object nativeSurface)
        Generate a new EGLSurface that wraps the specified native Android surface. Note that any current EGLSurface will be destroyed first.
        Parameters:
        nativeSurface - An instance of an Android Surface or SurfaceTexture
        Returns:
        The newly created EGLSurface or EGL14.EGL_NO_SURFACE is an error occurred

      • releaseSurface

        public void releaseSurface()
        Releases any current EGLSurface for this EglEnv instance
